con:soapui-project.name: xplan-api-manager
con:soapui-project.con:description:
For local execution use following property values:
baseUrlManagerApi=http://localhost:8086/xplan-api-manager baseUrlServices=http://localhost:8083 jdbcUrl=jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5433/xplanbox?user=postgres&password=postgres

con:method.name: showConfig
con:method.con:description: Returns the system and application configuration Show system and application configuration

con:method.name: import
con:method.con:description: Imports the plan Import the plan

con:parameter.con:name: X-Filename
con:parameter.con:description: Name of the file to be uploaded

con:parameter.con:name: skipSemantisch
con:parameter.con:description: skip semantische Validierung

con:parameter.con:name: skipFlaechenschluss
con:parameter.con:description: skip Flaechenschluss Ueberpruefung

con:parameter.con:name: skipGeltungsbereich
con:parameter.con:description: skip Geltungsbereich Ueberpruefung

con:parameter.con:name: internalId
con:parameter.con:description: internalId links to VerfahrensId

con:parameter.con:name: planStatus
con:parameter.con:description: target for data storage, overrides the default derived from xplan:rechtsstand

con:method.name: getByName
con:method.con:description: Returns a list of plans which match exactly the given planName Get plan identified by the given planName

con:parameter.con:name: planName
con:parameter.con:description: planName of the plan to be returned

con:method.name: getById
con:method.con:description: Returns an existing plan identified by the given plan ID Get plan identified by the given plan ID

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: ID of the plan to be returned

con:method.name: delete
con:method.con:description: Deletes an existing plan identified by the given plan ID Delete plan identified by the given plan ID

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: ID of the plan to be removed

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: planId of the plan to be returned

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: planId of the plan to be returned

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: ID of the plan to be returned

con:method.name: getArchiveById
con:method.con:description: Returns the XPlanArchive of an existing plan identified by the given planID Get plan as XPlanArchive identified by the given planID

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: planId of the plan basisdaten to be returned

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: planId of the plan to be returned

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: planId of the plan to return dokumente

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: ID of the plan to add dokumente

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: planId of the plan to get dokument

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: id of the Dokument to be returned (Pattern of the ID: referenzName-referenzURL, other characters than a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _, - are removed)

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: planId of the plan to replace dokument

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: id of the Dokument to be updated (Pattern of the ID: referenzName-referenzURL, other characters than a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _, - are removed)

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: planId of the plan to delete dokument

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: id of the Dokument to be deleted (Pattern of the ID: referenzName-referenzURL, other characters than a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _, - are removed)

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: id of the Rasterbasis to be returned (Pattern of the ID: referenzName-referenzURL, other characters than a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _, - are removed

con:parameter.con:name: planId
con:parameter.con:description: planId of the plan to be updated

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: id of the Rasterbasis to be updated (Pattern of the ID: referenzName-referenzURL, other characters than a-z, A-Z, 0-9, _, - are removed

con:method.name: findByName
con:method.con:description: Returns a list of plans where the plan name contains the query string case insensitve Search for plan by name

con:parameter.con:name: planName
con:parameter.con:description: The name of the plan to search for

con:testCase.name: / TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [/] located at [/]

con:configuration.content: {"get":{"tags":["edit"],"operationId":"getBasisdaten","parameters":[{"name":"planId","in":"path","description":"ID of the plan basisdaten to be returned","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":123}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Basisdaten"}}}},"400":{"description":"Unsupported plan version or planID is not a valid int value"},"404":{"description":"Invalid planID, plan not found"},"406":{"description":"Requested format is not available"}}},"put":{"tags":["edit"],"operationId":"replaceBasisdaten","parameters":[{"name":"planId","in":"path","description":"ID of the plan to be returned","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":123}],"requestBody":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Basisdaten"}}}},"responses":{"200":{"description":"successful operation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/Basisdaten"}}}},"400":{"description":"Unsupported plan version or planID is not a valid int value"},"404":{"description":"Invalid planID, plan not found"},"406":{"description":"Requested format is not available"},"422":{"description":"Request body contains invalid content"}}}}
[{"name":"profiles","in":"query","description":"Names of profiles which shall be additionaly used for validation","explode":false,"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}]
